mapper.select: select c.coupon_code as couponCode, c.coupon_serial_number as couponSerialNumber, c.coupon_name as couponName, c.coupon_discount_rate as couponDiscountRate, c.coupon_discount_amount as couponDiscountAmount, c.coupon_stock as couponStock, c.number_coupons_remaining as numberCouponRemaining, c.coupon_valid_period as couponValidPeriod, c.coupon_terms_use as couponTermsUse from coupon_details as c

SELECT c.coupon_code, c.coupon_name, c.coupon_discount_rate, c.coupon_discount_amount, mc.coupon_issue_code, mc.coupon_reg_dateTime, mc.coupon_end_date, mc.coupon_used FROM coupon_details AS c INNER JOIN member_coupon AS mc ON c.coupon_code = mc.coupon_code INNER JOIN member AS m ON mc.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND mc.coupon_end_date >= CURDATE() AND mc.coupon_used = 0;

/* 특정 쿠폰 조회*/ select c.coupon_code, c.coupon_serial_number, c.coupon_name, c.coupon_discount_rate, c.coupon_discount_amount, c.coupon_stock, c.number_coupons_remaining, c.coupon_valid_period, c.coupon_terms_use from coupon_details as c where c.coupon_code = #{couponCode};
